about_the_game:
Between the rocks are the ruins of an ancient building, once perhaps a castle or a fortress, but today it is only a collection of crumbling walls and columns. Over time, someone built a trap-filled obstacle course on top of the ruins, which can be reached through caves carved into the rocks. The obstacle course was built at breakneck height above the foliage of the trees, traps lurking step by step, and the ruins are dangerous in themselves, yet some try to walk through that strange structure in the hope that in the end, a fabulous wealth awaits them.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

The obstacle course was built at breakneck height above the foliage of the trees, traps lurking step by step, and the ruins are dangerous in themselves, yet some try to walk through that strange structure in the hope that in the end, a fabulous wealth awaits them.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
name: RPGScenery - Rocky Ruins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
